content: to the main body chain 10 r1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook ch1 turn 9 r2-17 single_crochet across in blo ch1 turn 9 r18 match row 1 and row 17 to form a tube single_crochet across using the empty chains of row 1 and blo of row 17 finish off leaving a long tail to sew up the opening of the arm weave the tail around the opening and pull to gather closed continue sewing around the opening until it is closed 3-4 times or more if you want once you have the top closed up you can bring your tail to the inside of the arm and knot it off please see the pictures used for the body assembly if you need a visual cid 2488 cid 2489 cid 2490 cid 2491 lightly stuff arm and attach to your cactus body knot on the inside i forgot to take pictures during this step but here are pictures of the arm after it has been attached stuff cactus page 3 of 20 a happy hooker and her yarn pot using the color of yarn you want your pot and a 4 0mm hook you will be working in rounds slip_stitch to beginning of each round and chain 1 unless otherwise written r1 mc 6 r2 increase around 12 r3 single_crochet increase around 18 r4 increase single_crochet single_crochet around 24 r5 bphdc around 24 r6 single_crochet single_crochet single_crochet increase 30 r7 single_crochet around 30 r8 single_crochet single_crochet increase single_crochet single_crochet 36 r9 single_crochet around 36 r10 increase single_crochet single_crochet single_crochet single_crochet single_crochet 42 r11 16 single_crochet around 42 r12 fpdc around 42 finish off fill a sealable baggie with dry rice i had jasmine rice in my cupboard so that s what i used you will want to put the baggie into the pot and fill it until it s just below the bottom of the pot gently tap your pot on a table to help the rice settle to the bottom i needed to use about ½ of a cup which came to 3 5ozs you will now attach the cactus to the pot using the long strand of dark brown yarn you will use the single_crochet stitches of the dirt and sew it into the pot between the top two row of single crochets leaving the double_crochet s that form the ridge of your pot see photos as you close up your cactus you will stuff the top of your baggie into the cactus i usually need to stuff more fiber fill in as i go as well finish off page 4 of 20 a happy hooker and her yarn page 5 of 20 a happy hooker and her yarn accessories for the accessories i will give you the basic pattern so that you have the option to play around with it and make new fun accessories then i ll give you each of the different accessories i made using that base pattern basic beanie 5 5mm hook
